name: Music_1091.wav
keywords: ['meditation music', 'low pitched synths', 'low pitched voices', 'dreamy feel', 'calming song', 'no percussion', 'religious chanting', 'relaxing music', 'ambient sounds']
caption: This meditation song features male voices chanting in deep, low voices. This is accompanied by synth sounds playing at different pitches. One of the synths plays a droning low pitch sound. The mid and higher register sounds play instruments sounding like wind instruments. The sounds produced are ambient sounds and have a dreamy feel. The song is relaxing and calming. This song can be played in a meditation center.
